items.name: Optimize Network Priority
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Optimizes network provider order (Local → Hosts → DNS → NetBT).

items.name: Optimize SMB & LAN Server Tweaks
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Tunes SMB settings for LAN performance.

items.name: Optimize UDP Firewall Settings
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Applies conservative UDP firewall behavior tweaks.

steps.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles settings unicastresponsetomulticast enable

items.name: Remove Limits on QoS
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Sets NonBestEffortLimit to 0%.

items.name: Tune TCP Acknowledgements Settings
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Tunes TCP ACK latency settings.

items.name: Apply: Disable Heuristics
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables TCP heuristics.

steps.command: netsh interface tcp set heuristics disabled
netsh interface tcp set heuristics enabled

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables TCP heuristics.
items.name: Revert: Disable Heuristics

steps.command: netsh interface tcp set heuristics enabled

items.name: Apply: Optimize MPP
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables TCP timestamps to reduce overhead.

steps.command: netsh interface tcp set global timestamps=disabled
netsh interface tcp set global timestamps=enabled

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables TCP timestamps to reduce overhead.
items.name: Revert: Optimize MPP

steps.command: netsh interface tcp set global timestamps=enabled

items.name: Apply: Disable Nagle (All Interfaces)
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables Nagle algorithm for all interfaces (low latency).

steps.command: $ifs=Get-ChildItem 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip\Parameters\Interfaces'; foreach($i in $ifs){ New-ItemProperty -Path $i.PSPath -Name TcpNoDelay -PropertyType DWord -Value 1 -Force | Out-Null }
$ifs=Get-ChildItem 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip\Parameters\Interfaces'; foreach($i in $ifs){ Remove-ItemProperty -Path $i.PSPath -Name TcpNoDelay -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables Nagle algorithm for all interfaces (low latency).
items.name: Revert: Disable Nagle (All Interfaces)

steps.command: $ifs=Get-ChildItem 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip\Parameters\Interfaces'; foreach($i in $ifs){ Remove-ItemProperty -Path $i.PSPath -Name TcpNoDelay -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }

items.name: Apply: Disable Delayed ACK (All Interfaces)
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Reduces ACK delay for lower latency.

steps.command: $ifs=Get-ChildItem 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip\Parameters\Interfaces'; foreach($i in $ifs){ New-ItemProperty -Path $i.PSPath -Name TcpAckFrequency -PropertyType DWord -Value 1 -Force | Out-Null; New-ItemProperty -Path $i.PSPath -Name TCPDelAckTicks -PropertyType DWord -Value 0 -Force | Out-Null }

$ifs=Get-ChildItem 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip\Parameters\Interfaces'; foreach($i in $ifs){ Remove-ItemProperty -Path $i.PSPath -Name TcpAckFrequency -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty -Path $i.PSPath -Name TCPDelAckTicks -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Reduces ACK delay for lower latency.
items.name: Revert: Disable Delayed ACK (All Interfaces)

steps.command: $ifs=Get-ChildItem 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip\Parameters\Interfaces'; foreach($i in $ifs){ Remove-ItemProperty -Path $i.PSPath -Name TcpAckFrequency -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-ItemProperty -Path $i.PSPath -Name TCPDelAckTicks -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }

items.name: Apply: Disable TCP Auto-Tuning
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables TCP receive window auto-tuning.

steps.command: netsh int tcp set global autotuninglevel=disabled
netsh int tcp set global autotuninglevel=normal

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables TCP receive window auto-tuning.
items.name: Revert: Disable TCP Auto-Tuning

steps.command: netsh int tcp set global autotuninglevel=normal

items.name: Apply: Disable ECN
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables Explicit Congestion Notification.

steps.command: netsh int tcp set global ecncapability=disabled
netsh int tcp set global ecncapability=default

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables Explicit Congestion Notification.
items.name: Revert: Disable ECN

steps.command: netsh int tcp set global ecncapability=default

items.name: Apply: Disable Receive Segment Coalescing (RSC)
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables RSC to reduce latency.

steps.command: netsh int tcp set global rsc=disabled
netsh int tcp set global rsc=enabled

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables RSC to reduce latency.
items.name: Revert: Disable Receive Segment Coalescing (RSC)

steps.command: netsh int tcp set global rsc=enabled

items.name: Apply: Disable TCP Timestamps
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables TCP timestamps.

steps.command: netsh int tcp set global timestamps=disabled
netsh int tcp set global timestamps=enabled

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables TCP timestamps.
items.name: Revert: Disable TCP Timestamps

steps.command: netsh int tcp set global timestamps=enabled

items.name: Apply: Set Congestion Provider (CTCP)
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Sets congestion provider to CTCP.

steps.command: netsh int tcp set global congestionprovider=ctcp
netsh int tcp set global congestionprovider=default

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Sets congestion provider to CTCP.
items.name: Revert: Set Congestion Provider (CTCP)

steps.command: netsh int tcp set global congestionprovider=default

items.name: Apply: Disable ISATAP/Teredo/6to4
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables IPv6 transition tunnels.

steps.command: netsh interface isatap set state disabled
netsh interface teredo set state disabled
netsh interface 6to4 set state disabled
netsh interface isatap set state default
netsh interface teredo set state default
netsh interface 6to4 set state default

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables IPv6 transition tunnels.
items.name: Revert: Disable ISATAP/Teredo/6to4

steps.command: netsh interface isatap set state default
netsh interface teredo set state default
netsh interface 6to4 set state default

items.name: Flush DNS Cache
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Flushes DNS resolver cache.

steps.command: ipconfig /flushdns

items.name: NIC Offloads (Guided)
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Guided: open NIC advanced settings to disable LSO/interrupt moderation for low latency.

steps.command: Start-Process 'ncpa.cpl'

items.name: Apply: Disable Large Send Offload (LSO)
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables Large Send Offload v2 (IPv4/IPv6) on all up adapters to reduce packet batching and latency.

steps.command: Get-NetAdapter | Where-Object {$_.Status -eq 'Up'} | ForEach-Object { try { Set-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty -Name $_.Name -DisplayName 'Large Send Offload v2 (IPv4)' -DisplayValue 'Disabled' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} try { Set-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty -Name $_.Name -DisplayName 'Large Send Offload v2 (IPv6)' -DisplayValue 'Disabled' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }

Get-NetAdapter | Where-Object {$_.Status -eq 'Up'} | ForEach-Object { try { Set-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty -Name $_.Name -DisplayName 'Large Send Offload v2 (IPv4)' -DisplayValue 'Enabled' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} try { Set-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty -Name $_.Name -DisplayName 'Large Send Offload v2 (IPv6)' -DisplayValue 'Enabled' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }

items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay, Ping / Network] Disables Large Send Offload v2 (IPv4/IPv6) on all up adapters to reduce packet batching and latency.
items.name: Revert: Disable Large Send Offload (LSO)

steps.command: Get-NetAdapter | Where-Object {$_.Status -eq 'Up'} | ForEach-Object { try { Set-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty -Name $_.Name -DisplayName 'Large Send Offload v2 (IPv4)' -DisplayValue 'Enabled' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} try { Set-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty -Name $_.Name -DisplayName 'Large Send Offload v2 (IPv6)' -DisplayValue 'Enabled' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } catch {} }

items.name: Amd Gpu Tweaks
items.description: [Imported] Runnable tweak extracted from your V8.3. This runs a command pack under Admin. Risk: Warning.

steps.command: "%~dp0\scripts\imported\oneclick\oneclick_amd_gpu_tweaks.bat"

items.name: Network Tweaks
items.description: [Imported] Runnable tweak extracted from your V8.3. This runs a command pack under Admin. Risk: Safe.

steps.command: "%~dp0\scripts\imported\oneclick\oneclick_network_tweaks.bat"
